name: haxe-jam-2021
description:
If you try to play this, I'm sorry it is not really a game! I spent more time working on the framework than the game itself and arguably should not have released it. However after a week of jamming it would have been a shame not to, even if there are more bugs and issues than I would normally be happy releasing.

There are even features I worked on that can't be seen because I left some configuration out by mistake in the final rush.

It's still a good result for me outside of the jam. I started with barely an engine and finished with barely a game, and and now I know where I want to take the framework.
